lessons.title: 1. Tesla Factory Tour - Full Process
lessons.notes:
Tesla Gigafactory Tour

Complete look at Tesla's massive Gigafactory. Watch raw aluminum castings turn into finished Model Y cars in under 2 hours through casting, press shop, bodying, painting, and general assembly.

  • 6000-ton casting machines
  • 4000 robotic welders
  • 1.2 million cars/year capacity

lessons.title: 2. BMW Body Shop Robots
lessons.notes:
BMW Body Shop - Robotic Welding

Watch 500+ robots weld BMW car bodies with micron-level precision. Each body gets 4500+ weld points in complete darkness for quality control.

  • Spot welding, MIG welding, laser welding
  • Zero human contact during welding
  • Body-in-white ready for paint shop

lessons.title: 3. Porsche Paint Shop
lessons.notes:
Porsche Paint Shop - 9 Stage Process

Inside Porsche's state-of-the-art paint facility. Cars go through 9 separate paint layers including cathodic dip coating, primer, base coat, and 3 clear coats - all robotically applied.

  • 140Â°F baking between layers
  • Zero defects tolerance
  • Custom color mixing on-demand

lessons.title: 4. Toyota Final Assembly
lessons.notes:
Toyota Final Assembly Line

Final assembly where engines, transmissions, seats, wiring, and interiors get installed. Famous Toyota Production System with kanban cards and just-in-time delivery.

  • 1.7 minutes per car station time
  • Andon cord stops line instantly
  • 100+ quality checks per vehicle
